existing_features.title: Update the Admin Orders panel UI (frontend) so the orders list and order details visually match the style of the uploaded reference screenshot (cart-style): rounded cards, soft shadows, warm primary accent for totals, clear spacing, and pill/rounded controls.

Make the Admin Order Details dialog use the same card/list styling as the reference screenshot for the order items section (cart-item style list), including a clear per-item layout and a summary block at the bottom that highlights the total in the warm primary color.

Add/adjust any necessary Tailwind utility classes or local styling (without editing immutable UI component sources) to support the new cart-style order cards and summary blocks across light and dark modes.

new_feature_requests.summary: Make the Order panel match the same styling/layout as the current admin panel (consistent look and feel).

projectName: Make Admin Orders panel match the uploaded cart-style UI
